description:
In this course,you can learn about The Landscape of Beijing,The traditional building in Beijing,Season's change in Beijing,Specialty Food in Beijing and The lifestyle in Beijing.

All of the above will be presented by video(with English aside)，test，and each of them will cost you less than 10 minutes to finish each course and there will be some little test after the video.

If you want to know city without the glory of 2008 Olympic and discover its true beauty,you can take this course. I will introduce my home town to you sincerely.

I recommend to read <The Last Days of Old Beijing> written by Michael Meyer before or during you take my course.

After finishing the course,you can get the following skills:

1. Recognize the traditional "Si he yuan" in "Hu tong".

2. Find the authentic Beijing snack without a tour guide.

3. Decide the properly season to visit Beijing.

4. Blend in the local people.
title: 10 minutes to know Beijing
